mapper.insert: insert into cw_alarm_record ( alarmId, monitorId, monitorName, monitorType, monitorProperty, topn, alarmScore, captureId, captureTime, alarmTime, deviceId, deviceCode, deviceType, deviceName, deviceAddress, lng, lat, panoramaId, captureUrlFull, panoramaUrlFull, remark, createTime, score, registerUrl, regId, regdbId, regdbName, name, cardId, birthday, cardGender, gender, age, maskState, glassesState, pitch, yaw, roll, cardNation, attribute )values( #{alarmId}, #{monitorId}, #{monitorName}, #{monitorType}, #{monitorProperty}, #{topn}, #{alarmScore}, #{captureId}, #{captureTime}, #{alarmTime}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceAddress}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{panoramaId}, #{captureUrlFull}, #{panoramaUrlFull}, #{remark}, now(), #{score}, #{registerUrl}, #{regId}, #{regdbId}, #{regdbName}, #{name}, #{cardId}, #{birthday}, #{cardGender}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{maskState}, #{glassesState}, #{pitch}, #{yaw}, #{roll}, #{cardNation}, #{attribute} )

insert into cw_alarm_record( alarmId, monitorId, monitorName, monitorType, monitorProperty, topn, alarmScore, captureId, captureTime, alarmTime, deviceId, deviceCode, deviceType, deviceName, deviceAddress, lng, lat, panoramaId, captureUrlFull, panoramaUrlFull, age, gender, maskState, glassesState, pitch, yaw, roll, remark, createTime, attribute) values (#{alarmId}, #{monitorId}, #{monitorName}, #{monitorType}, #{monitorProperty}, #{topn}, #{alarmScore}, #{captureId}, #{captureTime}, #{alarmTime}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceType}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceAddress}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{panoramaId}, #{captureUrlFull}, #{panoramaUrlFull}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{maskState}, #{glassesState}, #{pitch}, #{yaw}, #{roll}, #{remark}, now(), #{attribute})
